channel.title: [HOW TO] How to make an advertisement [HOW TO]
channel.description:
[b]I've seen enough crappy advertises that make me :palm:[/b]
Hi, join my server. I give mod. Thanks. -ServerKid
[b]So I've made this... guideline thingamajig...[/b] [b]Here's how to make a REAL advertisement:[/b] [b]By the way, I've added a tips and tricks section towards the bottom. Check it out for good advertising tricks[/b] [center][b][size=24pt]Welcome to Server_Name![/size][/b][/center] [center][b][OPTIONAL LOGO/BANNER HERE] [/b][/center] [center][b][size=24pt]Links[/size][/b][/center] Links are really important. What's the point in advertising if the viewers can't play? Say if I wanted to make www.servername.com into [url=http://www.servername.com]ServerName[/url] I'd just do this: [code][url=LINKHERE]Title of the link[/url][/code] Webclient: Client Download: Forums: [center][b][size=24pt]About Server_Name![/size][/b][/center] Write a short paragraph about this server, it's goals, etc. E.G.
Welcome to Server_Name. This server is based off Deltascape. Although I don't have much experience, I'm hoping to make this packed with fun things. It's economy based, and I hope you join.
[center][b][size=24pt]Update Log[/size][/b][/center] [code]-Your update log would go here. -An update log is sort of like a journal. -Write down what you've changed/added to the server.[/code] [center][b][size=24pt]Features[/size][/b][/center] This section is just the attention grabber. Put all the exciting features, here's what it should look like: [code]- Custom Bosses - Custom Construction - Construction - Vehicles - New weapons [/code] Of course, I haven't put much, seeing as I don't own a server at the moment. But you get the idea, right? [center][b][size=24pt]Media[/size][/b][/center] This part is to put all your media in. Pictures ALWAYS improve the advertisement. Use image tags. For example: [code] [img]YOUR IMAGE LINK HERE[/img] [/code] OR For a video, you'd do this: [code]YOUTUBE LINK[/code] So basically, just a link. [center][b][size=24pt]Hope to see you in-game![/size][/b][/center] ..now that was a good advertisement. I hope you advertisers improve your advertises. I don't want to see anymore:
Hi, join my server. I give mod. Thanks. -ServerKid
;) [hr] [center][size=24pt][b]Server Tips & Tricks![/b][/size][/center] [ul][li]Have a good title, like: [DELTA] ServerName - Where no man has been before [DELTA] [list][li]In your topic, BE MATURE. [/li][li]Recruit good staff members [/li][li]Be nice to commenters, If someone flames/rages at you, ignore them. [/li][li]Don't be a douche at someone when you're commenting [/li][li]Try to get a friend to bump it for you every [b]ONE DAY.[/b] [/list] - That's all for now, Thanks and goodbye![/ul]

item.description:
@system wrote:

I’ve seen enough crappy advertises that make me :palm:

Hi, join my server. I give mod. Thanks.

-ServerKid

So I’ve made this… guideline thingamajig…
Here’s how to make a REAL advertisement:
By the way, I’ve added a tips and tricks section towards the bottom. Check it out for good advertising tricks

[center][size=24pt]Welcome to Server_Name![/size][/center]
[center][OPTIONAL LOGO/BANNER HERE]
[/center]

[center][size=24pt]Links[/size][/center]
Links are really important. What’s the point in advertising if the viewers can’t play?
Say if I wanted to make www.servername.com into ServerName
I’d just do this: [url=LINKHERE]Title of the link[/url]
Webclient:
Client Download:
Forums:

[center][size=24pt]About Server_Name![/size][/center]

Write a short paragraph about this server, it’s goals, etc.
E.G.

Welcome to Server_Name. This server is based off Deltascape. Although I don't have much experience, I'm hoping to make this packed with fun things. It's economy based, and I hope you join.

[center][size=24pt]Update Log[/size][/center]

-Your update log would go here. -An update log is sort of like a journal. -Write down what you've changed/added to the server.

[center][size=24pt]Features[/size][/center]
This section is just the attention grabber. Put all the exciting features, here’s what it should look like:

[code]- Custom Bosses

  • Custom Construction
  • Construction
  • Vehicles
  • New weapons
    [/code]

Of course, I haven’t put much, seeing as I don’t own a server at the moment. But you get the idea, right?

[center][size=24pt]Media[/size][/center]
This part is to put all your media in. Pictures ALWAYS improve the advertisement.
Use image tags. For example:

OR

For a video, you’d do this:

So basically, just a link.

[center][size=24pt]Hope to see you in-game![/size][/center]

…now that was a good advertisement. I hope you advertisers improve your advertises. I don’t want to see anymore:

Hi, join my server. I give mod. Thanks.

-ServerKid


[hr]
[center][size=24pt]Server Tips & Tricks![/size][/center]

[ul][li]Have a good title, like: [DELTA] ServerName - Where no man has been before [DELTA]
[list][li]In your topic, BE MATURE.
[/li][li]Recruit good staff members
[/li][li]Be nice to commenters, If someone flames/rages at you, ignore them.
[/li][li]Don’t be a douche at someone when you’re commenting
[/li][li]Try to get a friend to bump it for you every ONE DAY.
[/list]

  • That’s all for now, Thanks and goodbye![/ul]
